publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-559.1 Richard Lochhead: Sustainable Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-559) in the name of Robin Harper, insert at end "and recognises that, by gaining the powers enjoyed by other independent member states of the EU, the Parliament's efforts to achieve sustainable development will be greatly enhanced as this will provide legislative powers over matters currently reserved to Her Majesty's Government that influence sustainable development, the ability to use fiscal measures and direct representation on international bodies dedicated to protecting the environment".
